locations.name: Robart Commons
locations.long_description: You find yourself back at Robart’s Commons–where you spent the whole night last night–and ah ha! You spot a small black usb exactly where you sat last night. Should you pick it up?

locations.name: New College Dining Hall
locations.long_description: You are currently standing in the New College Dining Hall. You realize they are serving ramen today (your favourite). Suddenly your stomach growls… should you buy the ramen…

locations.name: KungFu Tea
locations.long_description: You have arrived at the infamous KungFu Tea! You are debating buying a boba…

locations.name: UofT Bookstore
locations.long_description: You wandered inside the UofT Bookstore and spot the Sephora Vending Machine… something immediately catches your eye… your favourite lipgloss (which you just so happen ran out of)... how can you go about your day with dry lips! Do you buy the lipgloss?

locations.name: Morrison Hall
locations.long_description: You are in your dorm room at morrison hall. Such a cozy little shoebox

locations.name: Friend's Apartment
locations.long_description: Breaking out in a sweat, you are standing in front of your friend's apartment. You ask her if you possibly left something important at their place… she scurries into her kitchen and hands you something… do you take it?

locations.name: McLennan Physical Loboratory
locations.long_description: You are in the doorway of room 203 of McLennan Physical Laboratory (your favourite spot on campus). You had your MAT137 lecture here yesterday and you think that there is a possibility that you left your laptop charger here. Do you want to check around

items.name: Ramen
items.description: You just bought a hot tonkatsu ramen. It looks delicious. You quickly gobble it down, but soon regret it as your stomach starts to hurt

items.name: USB Drive
items.description: ALAS! It's the USB drive storing your project. You and your partner can now relax... a bit

items.name: Lucky Mug
items.description: OMG! It's my lucky mug. I'm so glad, I was so worried that I had submit my project without it.

items.name: Lipgloss
items.description: Great! A restock of my lipgloss, my lips will be so hydrated.

items.name: Laptop Charger
items.description: Just as I thought, I left my laptop charger plugged in here. I can finally charge my laptop.

items.name: Bubble Tea
items.description: Yum! Who doesn't love bubble tea, now I will be caffeinated and awake.
